Articles.Content: Anyone think that Ksp should make a list of mods we downloaded so it will make us easy to update our mods like in Skyrim where there is a list of mods
or you can just look in your plugins folder, it isn't all that hard

Well, I think that is a great idea, but not for this stage of the game. What I do is that I have a "MODS" folder in my KSP directory in which I put all the compressed files I download. From there, I just open them up and copy paste what I need. I know it isn't the most elegant solution, and it is somewhat a pain the butt to do, but it works.
